name: Sartorial
description: Challenge creativity on a daily basis, through a photo sharing platform and also build brand loyalty.
brief: Clothing is a product essential to our daily lives. However, too often we get into a rut when it comes to dressing up; we have favorite outfits that we wear over and over again.
sub_brief: In this school, project we were challenged to think of a creative solution to a problem using a mobile photosharing app. Aside from content sharing platform, I wanted the app to challenge the user's creativity regularaly, as well as build brand loyalty between clothes lovers and their favorite brands.
solution: A mobile application that challenges our habits and makes dressing up fun. Sartorial provides color palettes based on real time weather; challenging users to create a new looks using color pallete.
wireframes_text: Sartorial's core features addresses three objectives that pertains to a fashionista: what to wear, sharing photos of outfits, and brand loyalty.
visual_design_text: I wanted Sartorial's visual language to reflect the elegant, bold, feminine and clean design or editorial magazines.

explanations.title: Stay Updated
explanations.body: The home screen features a user's feed that consists of posts from people that a user follows. Through the home screen a user can also access the notificans page.

explanations.title: Color Challenges
explanations.body: Users are presented with difference color pallettes. These color palettes are organized by color combinations.

explanations.title: Upload a photo
explanations.body: After creating thir outfits, users are encouraged to upload a photo of their outfit.

explanations.title: Sync Colors
explanations.body: Sartorial analyzes the photo to make sure the users used the correct colors to complete the challenge.

explanations.title: Create Post
explanations.body: The user is prompted to write a title for his/her post.

explanations.title: Tag Items
explanations.body: The user is encouraged to tag their clothing items in their outfit.

explanations.title: Get Inspired
explanations.body: The inspiration page displays posts from other users using the app. The posts are filtered based on weather and color scheme. Clicking on a post will take users to a detailed photo page. It features the photo(s) that a user has uploaded, along with information on the weather, color scheme of the outfits, and clothing brands in the outfit.

explanations.title: Wear your favorite brands and get rewarded
explanations.body: Through tagging the brands of clothes that they are wearing, a user has the chance to earn coupons from their favorite brands. The coupons page displays coupons that a user has been rewarded. Clicking on the coupons will reveal the coupons details page.
